wikipedia_page.main: Arthur Nugent (30 May 1926 – 6 October 1995) was a Scottish footballer who played as a full back in the Scottish League for Albion Rovers, in the English Football League for Darlington, in Scottish Junior football for Arthurlie, and in English non-league football for Canterbury City and Poole Town.

response: *Arthur Nugent (1825–1897), Austrian Oberst, Croatian Magnate and MP for Zagreb county, son of Laval
